医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
报告称，医生必须解决帕金森病患者隐藏的耻辱负担根据专门研究帕金森病和其他运动障碍的专家的一份报告，如果不能解决患者的社会排斥、孤立、孤独感和其他耻辱心理影响，即使是帕金森病的最佳治疗方法也是不够的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Doctors-must-address-Parkinsone28099s-病人se28099-hidden-burden-of-stigma-report-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Doctors-must-address-Parkinsone28099s-病人se28099-hidden-burden-of-stigma-report-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8262a662-85e4-4b4d-aa99-326831346a62 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 16:22:51 -0400 Doctors must address Parkinson’s patients’ hidden burden of stigma, report says
成人食物扫盲计划可有效产生饮食行为的积极变化提高食物素养可以积极影响饮食质量并降低患慢性病的风险；然而，对其有效性的证据的解释是有限的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Adult-food-literacy-program- effective-in-making-positive-changes-across-dietary-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Adult-food-literacy-program- effective-in-making-positive-changes-across-dietary-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb9a2336-0ac3-41c1-a95e-c736a59236c9 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 16:13:32 -0400 Adult food literacy program effective in producing positive changes across dietary behaviors
肯塔基大学心血管科学家因在高血压研究方面的卓越表现而获得认可肯塔基大学的研究副校长和领先的心血管科学家因其在高血压领域的基础性工作而获得美国心脏协会 (AHA) 颁发的著名奖项的认可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/University-of-Kentuckys-cardioangio-scientist-recognized-for-excellence-in-hypertension-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/University-of-Kentuckys-cardioangio-scientist-recognized-for-excellence-in-hypertension-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7db28f2-9a8d-43a3-bb1a-10cc5d9cff04 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 16:01:17 -0400 University of Kentucky's cardiovascular scientist recognized for excellence in hypertension research
全球卫生专家将在联合国开会讨论100天大流行病防范任务纽约联合国大会科学峰会将邀请全球卫生专家阵容，他们将于 9 月 14 日星期四齐聚一堂，制定领导人需要采取的具体行动，以实现大流行病防备 100 天任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Global-health-experts-to-meet-at-UN-to-discuss-100-days-mission-for-pandemic-preparedness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Global-health-experts-to-meet-at-UN-to-discuss-100-days-mission-for-pandemic-preparedness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba029905-8589-4ad8-8267-f6d9ee6fffb7 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 15:53:03 -0400 Global health experts to meet at UN to discuss 100 days mission for pandemic preparedness
统一和集中的肺癌宣传计划使研究经费增加了 25%根据今天在国际肺癌研究协会 2023 年世界大会上发表的演讲，美国一项统一、集中的肺癌宣传计划导致美国肺癌研究计划的资金增加了 25%。新加坡的肺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Unified-and-concentrate-lung-cancer-advocacy-program-results-in-2525-increase-in-research-funding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Unified-and-concentrate-lung-cancer-advocacy-program-results-in-2525-increase-in-research-funding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=683db412-91a7-420f-9e89-be31c818eea7 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 15:21:29 -0400 Unified and concentrated lung cancer advocacy program results in 25% increase in research funding
研究揭示了可能增加女性肺癌风险的关键生殖因素在国际肺癌研究协会 2023 年世界肺癌大会上发表的一项研究表明，关键的生殖因素，如更年期提前、生育期缩短和第一胎年龄过早，与女性患肺癌的风险升高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Study-reveals-key-reproductive-factors-that-may-increase-lung-cancer-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Study-reveals-key-reproductive-factors-that-may-increase-lung-cancer-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8687632c-ec7b-4258-aa37-510447e8bcba Tue, 12 Sep 2023 15:17:31 -0400 Study reveals key reproductive factors that may increase lung cancer risk in women
调强放射治疗可减少非小细胞肺癌患者心脏和肺部的辐射暴露德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森分校的研究人员表示，调强放射治疗 (IMRT) 应是治疗局部晚期非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 患者的首选，因为它可以减少心脏和肺部的辐射暴露癌症中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Intensity-modulated-radiation-therapy-reduces-radiation-exposure-to-heart-and-lungs-in-NSCLC-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Intensity-modulated-radiation-therapy-reduces-radiation-exposure-to-heart-and-lungs-in-NSCLC-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2eaf097-d4ca-4e74-bcf5-25a8ff8616e4 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 15:13:35 -0400 Intensity-modulated radiation therapy reduces radiation exposure to heart and lungs in NSCLC patients
Arf1 抑制通过促进 T 细胞浸润诱导肿瘤消退近年来，以免疫检查点阻断（ICB）为代表的癌症免疫疗法取得了巨大成功，成为未来癌症治疗的重要基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Arf1-inhibition-induces-tumor-regression-by-promoting-T-cell-infiltration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Arf1-inhibition-induces-tumor-regression-by-promoting-T-cell-infiltration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35f3c06f-619e-4123-acd6-ed5bfd6b7154 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 15:04:51 -0400 Arf1 inhibition induces tumor regression by promoting T cell infiltration
单心室生理学与成人先天性心脏病移植受者较高的短期死亡率相关加州大学洛杉矶分校领导的研究发现，在成人先天性心脏病（CHD）移植受者中，单心室生理学与较高的短期死亡率相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Single-ventricle-physiology-correlates-with-higher-short-term-mortality-among-adult-congenital-heart-disease-transplant-recipients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Single-ventricle-physiology-correlates-with-higher-short-term-mortality-among-adult-congenital-heart-disease-transplant-recipients.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fb60d4f-35bb-4ea3-a99e-6ae5c9f0dd5a Tue, 12 Sep 2023 14:49:42 -0400 Single-ventricle physiology correlates with higher short-term mortality among adult congenital heart disease transplant recipients
促使医疗专业人员退出 NHS 的主要原因：工作压力、工作量大和人手不足开放获取期刊 BMJ Open 上发表的一项调查结果表明，工作压力、高工作量和人手不足是促使卫生专业人员退出 NHS 的主要因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Top-reasons-driven-health-professionals-out-of-the-NHS-Work-stress-high-workload-and-understaffing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Top-reasons-driven-health-professionals-out-of-the-NHS-Work-stress-high-workload-and-understaffing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4412a108-a24b-41f0-9dc5-40f34235284b Tue, 12 Sep 2023 14:30:04 -0400 Top reasons driving health professionals out of the NHS: Work stress, high workload, and understaffing
